Container.Name: FocusAssistant
Container.Overview: Focus Assistant is an ADHD-friendly productivity app featuring task management with the Eisenhower Matrix, a Pomodoro timer, daily planning, weekly reviews, reading list, reminders, and detailed statistics. All data is stored locally in Markdown files â€” no external database required.

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Persistent storage for your tasks, settings, and stats (Markdown files)

Config.Name: SKIP_AUTH
Config.Description: Set to true to bypass OAuth (required for self-hosted). Set to false only if you have external OAuth configured.

Config.Name: GOOGLE_SHEETS_ID
Config.Description: (Optional) Google Sheets ID for cloud sync. Leave blank to use local Markdown storage only.

Config.Name: GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_EMAIL
Config.Description: (Optional) Google service account email for Sheets sync.

Config.Name: GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY
Config.Description: (Optional) Google service account private key for Sheets sync.
